cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 12th JULY, 1918.1. WESTER1I FRONT.On the British front tho situation is unchanged.This morning the French captured the village of OASTEL (North-west of MOREUIL) also two farms in this neighbourhood, advancing their line on a front of two kilometres to a depth of one and a half kilometres. So far 280 prisoners are reported. It is also reported that the French have captured the village of LONGPONT (on the eastern outskirts of RETZ Forest).2, ITALIAN FRONT.There is nothing to report.General Staff,War Office, S.W.I. 12th July, 1918.Issued at 6.30 p.m.
